name: Rodeo
overview: Playable by 1 or 2 players, this game puts the player in the old western rodeo style. There are various contests such as horse and bull rodeo, static and mobile targets firing, cow catching and some others. Events have either time or ammo limitation or even both. Each gamer alternatively must play all contests, one by one, and must succeed and obtain high scores; at the end of the game, the best gamer will be rewarded with the trophy.
